name: ITLibAlbum
desc: This class provides information about an album in the iTunes library.

items.name: var trackCount: Int
items.desc: The number of tracks in the album.

items.name: var sortTitle: String?
items.desc: The title to use when sorting by album title.

items.name: var isRatingComputed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system computes the rating of the album using the ratings of individual tracks in the album.

items.name: var isGapless: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the album is gapless.

items.name: var discNumber: Int
items.desc: The index (1, 2, 3, and so on) of the disc within an album thatâ€™s a multiple-disc set.

items.name: var discCount: Int
items.desc: The number of discs in a multiple-disc set.

items.name: var isCompilation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the album is a compilation.

items.name: var albumArtist: String?
items.desc: The name of the artist iTunes associates with the album.

items.name: var sortAlbumArtist: String?
items.desc: The name to use when sorting by album artist.

items.name: var persistentID: NSNumber
items.desc: The unique identifier of the album.
